alert.note: Alert for Suffolk (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 7:07PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Hertford, and northwestern Gates Counties and the southwestern City of Suffolk through 745 PM EDT... At 707 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Como, or 8 miles south of Franklin, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gatesville, Suffolk, Gates, Como, Roduco, Whaleyville, Topsy, Drum Hill, Buckland, Cleopus, Dort, Somerton, Riddicksville, Bartonsville, Wyanoke, Reynoldson and Eure. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
